00004 SEXP CHMfactor_to_sparse(SEXP x)
00005 {
00006     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(x), Lcp;
00007     CHM_SP Lm;
00008     R_CheckStack();
00009 
00010     /* cholmod_l_factor_to_sparse changes its first argument. Make a copy */
00011     Lcp = cholmod_l_copy_factor(L, &c);
00012     if (!(Lcp->is_ll))
00013         if (!cholmod_l_change_factor(Lcp->xtype, 1, 0, 1, 1, Lcp, &c))
00014             error(_("cholmod_l_change_factor failed with status %d"), c.status);
00015     Lm = cholmod_l_factor_to_sparse(Lcp, &c); cholmod_l_free_factor(&Lcp, &c);
00016     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(Lm, 1/*do_free*/, -1/*uploT*/, 0/*Rkind*/,
00017                               "N"/*non_unit*/, R_NilValue/*dimNames*/);
00018 }

00020 SEXP CHMfactor_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b, SEXP system)
00021 {
00022     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(a);
00023     SEXP bb = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00024     CHM_DN B = AS_CHM_DN(bb), X;
00025     int sys = asInteger(system);
00026     R_CheckStack();
00027 
00028     if (!(sys--))               /* -- align with CHOLMOD defs */
00029         error(_("system argument is not valid"));
00030 
00031     X = cholmod_l_solve(sys, L, B, &c);
00032     UNPROTECT(1);
00033     return chm_dense_to_SEXP(X, 1/*do_free*/, 0/*Rkind*/,
00034                              GET_SLOT(bb, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00035 }

00038 {

00042     R_CheckStack();
00043 
00044     if (!(sys--))               /* -- align with CHOLMOD defs */
00045         error(_("system argument is not valid"));
00046     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(cholmod_l_spsolve(sys, L, B, &c),
00047                               1/*do_free*/, 0/*uploT*/, 0/*Rkind*/,

00059 double chm_factor_ldetL2(CHM_FR f)
00060 {
00061     int i, j, p;
00062     double ans = 0;
00063 
00064     if (f->is_super) {
00065         int *lpi = (int*)(f->pi), *lsup = (int*)(f->super);
00066         for (i = 0; i < f->nsuper; i++) { /* supernodal block i */
00067             int nrp1 = 1 + lpi[i + 1] - lpi[i],
00068                 nc = lsup[i + 1] - lsup[i];
00069             double *x = (double*)(f->x) + ((int*)(f->px))[i];
00070 
00071             for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
00072                 ans += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
00073             }
00074         }
00075     } else {
00076         int *li = (int*)(f->i), *lp = (int*)(f->p);
00077         double *lx = (double *)(f->x);
00078 
00079         for (j = 0; j < f->n; j++) {
00080             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
00081             if (li[p] != j) {
00082                 error(_("diagonal element %d of Cholesky factor is missing"), j);
00083                 break;          /* -Wall */
00084             }
00085             ans += log(lx[p] * ((f->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
00086         }
00087     }
00088     return ans;
00089 }

00091 SEXP CHMfactor_ldetL2(SEXP x)
00092 {
00093     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(x); R_CheckStack();
00094 
00095     return ScalarReal(chm_factor_ldetL2(L));
00096 }

00112 CHM_FR chm_factor_update(CHM_FR f, CHM_SP A, double mult)
00113 {
00114     int ll = f->is_ll;
00115     double mm[2] = {0, 0};
00116     mm[0] = mult;
00117     if (!cholmod_l_factorize_p(A, mm, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, f, &c))
00118         error(_("cholmod_l_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d of ncol %d"),
00119               c.status, f->minor, f->n);
00120     if (f->is_ll != ll)
00121         if(!cholmod_l_change_factor(f->xtype, ll, f->is_super, 1 /*to_packed*/,
00122                                     1 /*to_monotonic*/, f, &c))
00123            error(_("cholmod_l_change_factor failed"));
00124     return f;
00125 }

00127 SEXP CHMfactor_update(SEXP object, SEXP parent, SEXP mult)
00128 {
00129     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(object), Lcp;
00130     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP__(parent);
00131     R_CheckStack();
00132 
00133     Lcp = cholmod_l_copy_factor(L, &c);
00134     return chm_factor_to_SEXP(chm_factor_update(Lcp, A, asReal(mult)), 1);
00135 }

00137 SEXP destructive_CHM_update(SEXP object, SEXP parent, SEXP mult)
00138 {
00139     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(object);
00140     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP__(parent);
00141     R_CheckStack();
00142 
00143     return chm_factor_to_SEXP(chm_factor_update(L, A, asReal(mult)), 0);

00146 SEXP CHMfactor_ldetL2up(SEXP x, SEXP parent, SEXP mult)
00147 {
00148     SEXP ans = PROTECT(duplicate(mult));
00149     int i, nmult = LENGTH(mult);
00150     double *aa = REAL(ans), *mm = REAL(mult);
00151     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(x), Lcp;
00152     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP__(parent);
00153     R_CheckStack();
00154 
00155     Lcp = cholmod_l_copy_factor(L, &c);
00156     for (i = 0; i < nmult; i++)
00157         aa[i] = chm_factor_ldetL2(chm_factor_update(Lcp, A, mm[i]));
00158     cholmod_l_free_factor(&Lcp, &c);
00159     UNPROTECT(1);
00160     return ans;
00161 }
